youtube.title: The Best Position for Feeding Babies to Prevent Gas and Reflux
youtube.description: Discover the science behind the correct reclined position for babies. Learn how a 25-35 degree angle helps separate gas from milk in the stomach to improve digestion and reduce fussiness. Essential tips for new parents and caregivers.
